node.description: Wrapper around OpenAI Chat large language models.
Chain to have a conversation and load context from memory.

chat.message: Hi, my name is Carlos. I'm 32 years old and I've been working for Logspace one year.

Hello Carlos! It's nice to meet you. My programming indicates that you are a 32-year-old employee who has been working for Logspace for a year. That's great!

Is there anything specific you would like to talk about or learn today? I'm eager to assist you in any way I can.
